sentence: Cheney is up for reelection this November but will first have to face off against Trump-backed Harriet Hageman in the GOP primary.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: RNC to debate Trump ally's resolution to expel Cheney, Kinzinger: report

sentence: Cheney faces Trump-endorsed challenger Harriet Hageman in an August primary this year, though she continues to break personal fundraising records.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Push to oust Cheney and Kinzinger from GOP simmers in Congress as RNC debates it

sentence: History will be their judge.? While Kinzinger is retiring from Congress at the end of his term, Cheney faces a primary challenge from Trump-endorsed candidate Harriet Hageman.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Republican National Committee censures Liz Cheney and Kinzinger

sentence: 11 In addition to Friday's formal censure at the party's winter meeting in Salt Lake City, the RNC also made plans to fund a primary challenge against Cheney in Wyoming after state Republican leaders passed a special rule to recognize Harriet Hageman, her challenger, as the party's presumptive nominee.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Rule Change Means Liz Cheney's Primary Challenger Could Receive Financial Support

sentence: "I am proud to endorse Harriet Hageman for Congress," McCarthy said in a statement tweeted out by Hageman.
title: Doing Trump's bidding, House GOP leadership endorses Liz Cheney's primary challenger

sentence: More than 100 House Republicans are set to cohost a fundraiser for Harriet Hageman, the leading primary challenger against GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, according to Politico.

title: More than 100 House Republicans will cohost a fundraiser for Rep. Liz Cheney's leading primary challenger

sentence: More than 100 House Republicans have signed on to host a fundraiser for Harriet Hageman, who is waging a primary challenge to Cheney in Wyoming.
title: More than 100 House Republicans to cohost fundraiser for Cheney challenger

author: Max Greenwood
title: House GOP keeps Trump at arm's length as it hones midterm strategy

sentence: You're not one of us anymore (via Daily Caller): House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy said over 100 Republicans from Congress will be supporting Republican Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney's primary opponent, Harriet Hageman, in an exclusive interview with the Daily Caller.
author: Matt Vespa
title: Scores of Congressional Republicans Are Coming to Wyoming to Let Liz Cheney Know How Much She Sucks

sentence: Dozens of House Republicans are expected to attend House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy's fundraiser for Rep. Liz Cheney's Wyoming GOP primary opponent, Harriet Hageman, on Wednesday evening in an increasingly bitter contest over fealty by party members to former President Donald Trump.
author: Juliegrace Brufke
title: Liz Cheney primary opponent fundraiser draws scores of GOP House incumbents

sentence: Liz sadly belongs in an MSNBC or CNN news chair, not in Congress representing Wyoming,? Stefanik said in her endorsement statement for Harriet Hageman.
